Package game.item

Class GoldenRune

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.item.GoldenRune
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Consumable
public class GoldenRune extends Item implements Consumable
New Consumable item ; Golden Rune This item can be consumed by the player to add a random amount of runes from 200-10000 to the player's inventory. This item can be picked up by the player and can be dropped by the player.
Author:
Joshua Lim Boon Hor
